medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent epigastric pain radiating to throat and left arm.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began after an endoscopy one week ago for recurrent esophageal strictures, leading to increasing pain and intermittent fevers, which were not present on the day of transfer. Pain significantly improved before arrival at the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes (diet-controlled), Dyslipidemia, GERD, esophageal stricture s/p multiple dilitations, s/p cholecystectomy, Shoulder surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Heart disease in mother, father, and younger brother with MI.
